Author: Llama#1330
Content: How do I access the cli on windows?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @Llama get the komodo binaries for windows from here and run them through command prompt https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/releases/download/multios-201810011016-71fc062/komodo_win64_master.zip

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
to start dice in Windows, you need to type 
```
komodod.exe -ac_name=KMDICE -ac_supply=10500000 -ac_reward=2500000000 -ac_halving=210000 -ac_cc=2 -addressindex=1 -spentindex=1 -addnode=144.76.217.232
```
